text: Ashley Modurotolu Banjo is an English street dancer, choreographer and actor. ==Works== He is the leader of the Diversity dance group that won the third series of Britain's Got Talent. Banjo was a judge on Sky One's talent show Got to Dance. He was also a co-host of the BBC's Saturday night game show Can't Touch This. Since 2018, he has been a judge on Dancing on Ice. ==Street dance== Ashley replaced Simon Cowell, who was recovering from an electric motorcycle accident, as a judge on ITV's Britain's Got Talent in September and October 2020 during the live shows. Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:English dancers
title: Ashley Banjo
